bibl.title: The Date of Chariton's Chaereas and Callirhoe Revisited.
bibl.note: Chariton must have read Plutarch's Theseus and this fact places Chariton after AD 116 and before AD 150, the terminus ante quem supplied by the papyri. - Pp. 207-208: Bibliography.
bibl.seg: CUEVA Edmund P., The Date of Chariton's Chaereas and Callirhoe Revisited.
Chariton must have read Plutarch's Theseus and this fact places Chariton after AD 116 and before AD 150, the terminus ante quem supplied by the papyri. - Pp. 207-208: Bibliography.
